beer.name: Beertown Brown
beer.description: BridgePort welcomes you to Beertown, and the smooth flavor of our Northern English style brown ale. Beertown Brown brings together roasted chocolate and caramel malts in a flavorful handshake. Hops add a little crisp spice to the mix for the perfectly balanced pint. Once the last crayon pulled out of the box, it's now your new reason to love beer.
